entry.title: Nigeria Plans to Include Fintechs in Broadened Official Currency Market
entry.summary:
A Nigerian official recently said the foreign exchange-starved country plans to include ‚Äúlegitimate‚Äù market participants like bureaux de change and financial technology companies in the official forex currency market. Finance Minister Wale Edun also said the country will receive $10 billion in inflows in the next few weeks.
Nigeria Contemplates Outlawing Forex Parallel Market
Nigeria is planning to broaden the official currency market to include ‚Äúlegitimate‚Äù participants such as bureaux de change and financial technology companies, Taiwo Oyedele, a member of President Bola Tinubu‚Äôs committee on fiscal policy and tax reforms, has said. Oyedele, who spoke at the Nigerian Economic Summit on Oct. 23, revealed that the government is also considering making it illegal to trade on the foreig‚Ä¶

entry.title: Pro-XRP Lawyer Deaton Predicts Timeline For Final Ripple-SEC Judgment
entry.summary:
Prominent attorney advocating for XRP investors, John Deaton, has shared his views on the ongoing case between Ripple and the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Deaton took to X (formerly Twitter), predicting a prolonged timeline before a final judgment is reached and also pointed to the slim chances of a settlement between the two parties.
‚ÄúI do not believe there has been a single serious conversation regarding settlement between Ripple, Brad Garlinghouse, Chris Larsen and the SEC. The SEC is pissed and embarrassed and wants $770M worth of flesh,‚Äù Deaton stated. He elaborated further, emphasizing the thoroughness required for the penalty phase. ‚ÄúWhat people need to understand is that the penalty phase is like a second case requiring more depositions, interrogatories, requests ‚Ä¶

entry.title: California Enacts Digital Financial Assets Law
entry.summary:
On October 13, 2023, California enacted the Digital Financial Assets law. This law is California‚Äôs first comprehensive framework for regulation of digital asset markets, and some of its provisions may sound familiar to those versed in the state‚Äôs money transmitter licensing requirements. Under this new law, on and after July 2025, crypto companies and everyone else will need, in addition to other criteria, a license to operate or hold themselves out as being able to operate digital financial asset business activity, with or on behalf of California residents.
The following editorial was written by guest authors Wyatt Noble and Michael Handelsman for Kelman.Law
Key Definitions
Before diving into the key provisions of the Digital Financial Assets law, it‚Äôs important to understand exactl‚Ä¶

entry.title: Critic Slams SEC On Bitcoin ETF: Is The Agency Intimidated By BlackRock?
entry.summary:
A critic on Reddit¬†believes¬†that the recent surge in Bitcoin prices, which broke above critical resistance levels registered in July 2023 and reached 2023 highs, may be partially attributed to the United States Securities and Exchange Commission‚Äôs (SEC) potential intimidation by BlackRock‚Äôs significant influence in Wall Street.
Reddit User Questions The Influence Of BlackRock On Bitcoin ETF Application
The user expressed concern that while the agency has been reviewing several Bitcoin ETFs, none have been approved yet. However, BlackRock‚Äôs iShares Blockchain and Tech ETF, which has the ticker symbol IBTC, was briefly listed on the Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation (DTCC) website on October 24 before being quickly delisted.
Even though the SEC has not publicly issued a stateme‚Ä¶

entry.title: DTCC‚Äôs Delisting Of BlackRock‚Äôs iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF Deemed ‚ÄòIntentional‚Äô
entry.summary:
The recent delisting and subsequent relisting of BlackRock‚Äôs iShares Bitcoin Trust exchange-traded fund (ETF) by the Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation (DTCC) has caused a stir in the cryptocurrency market.¬†
The sudden removal of the ETF from the DTCC‚Äôs listings on Tuesday, coupled with the temporary unavailability of the DTCC website, led to a significant drop in Bitcoin‚Äôs price.¬†
However, after being relisted, Bitcoin has resumed its bullish trajectory, trading at $34,600 to reclaim the $35,000 level.
Delisting Of BlackRock‚Äôs iShares Bitcoin Trust Sparks Controversy¬†
BlackRock‚Äôs proposed iShares Bitcoin Trust was added to the DTCC‚Äôs reference database on Monday with the IBTC ticker symbol. However, without any explanation, IBTC was abruptly removed from the DTCC‚Äôs listings‚Ä¶

entry.title: Ex-FTX Chief‚Äôs Defense Team Challenges FBI Interviews, Raises Questions About Witness Credibility
entry.summary:
On Wednesday, the defense team for the former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried issued a letter to the judge seeking to question two FBI agents who interviewed Gary Wang, former chief technology officer of FTX, and Nishad Singh, former director of engineering at FTX. Lawyers allege the witnesses provided ‚Äúinconsistent statements‚Äù that don‚Äôt match their original interviews with the agents.
Former FTX Executives‚Äô Testimonies Under Scrutiny in Ongoing Bankman-Fried Trial
Lawyers for Sam Bankman-Fried are interested in the ‚Äúelicited testimony‚Äù gathered by two FBI agents who interviewed Gary Wang and Nishad Singh. The letter says Wang was questioned on October 6, and they asked him about specific statements he gave to the special agents on November 17, 2022, and December 7, 2022.
‚ÄúMr. Bankman-Fri‚Ä¶

In a bid to ‚Äúsafeguard consumers,‚Äù the UK Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) has issued a warning regarding ‚Äúcommon issues‚Äù observed in crypto asset promotions.¬†With the implementation of a new marketing regime, the FCA has asserted its authority over crypto promotions in the UK.
FCA Unveils Alert List To Expose ‚ÄòNon-Compliant Crypto Entities‚Äô
The FCA has identified specific ‚Äúareas of concern‚Äù since the new marketing rules were enacted. To address these issues, the financial watchdog has shared an updated ‚Äúalert list‚Äù to highlight ‚Äúnon-compliant entities.‚Äù¬†
The FCA‚Äôs statement emphasized that the change in legislation has brought crypto asset promotions under its remit, enabling it to supervise firms and ‚Äúensure consumers‚Äù receive accurate information and risk warnings.

The US-based cryptocurrency trading platform Robinhood has recently extended the Shiba Inu trading services to the 7th-largest state in the United States ‚Äì the state of Nevada. This marks a significant step for the cryptocurrency platform.
Shiba Inu Is Now Tradable In Nevada
Robinhood Crypto is a trading platform designed for buying and selling assets in a user-friendly manner, with offerings of zero or no commission to its users to invest in stocks. However, it was not readily available in every state in the United States.
The trading platform is currently taking steps to change this as it announced that the cryptocurrency service is now available in the state of Nevada. It said this on its official customer‚Äôs consultant X (formerly Twitter) handle highlighting that a list of 15 c‚Ä¶

Ramaswamy warned: ‚ÄúIf we enter a major conflict, anything resembling World War III against a Russia-China alliance with potentially Iran and/or North Korea included on the other side, the United States as we know it will cease to exist.‚Äù
Elon Musk, Vivek Ramaswamy Discuss World War III Risk

entry.title: Hidden In Plain Sight: Why 85% Of Q3‚Äôs Crypto Biggest Scams Went Undetected
entry.summary:
Blockchain security auditor Hacken recently revealed concerning insights into the proliferation of ‚Äòrug pulls, a malicious tactic aimed at stealing funds from crypto users,¬†and how they accounted for the majority of Q3 crypto scams.
Rug Pulls: The Prevalent Crypto Scourge
‚ÄòRug pulls,‚Äô as they are colloquially referred to, are a specific type of exit scam. Project teams artificially inflate the value of their token before abruptly removing all liquidity, leaving investors in the lurch. Disturbingly, this method made up roughly 65.1% of all Q3 hacks, Hacken‚Äôs research showed.
According to the report, a core reason behind such high numbers is the ease with which these scams can be concocted. With ‚Äútoken factories‚Äù churning out fraudulent tokens en masse, this menace seems poised to co‚Ä¶

entry.title: FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried To Testify In Own Defense On October 26th
entry.summary:
In a recent CNBC report, it has been revealed that indicted FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried will take the stand in his defense, as confirmed by his lawyer.¬†
This decision, while seen as a risky maneuver, will subject Bankman-Fried to cross-examination by federal prosecutors.
FTX Founder Set To Face Prosecution
Bankman-Fried‚Äôs defense team had previously argued that resolving his access to medication for Attention-Deficit / Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) was necessary for his full participation in the defense.¬†
With the medication issue now resolved, the FTX founder will testify in his defense, allowing federal prosecutors to question him regarding the collapse of his cryptocurrency exchange, FTX.¬†
Per the report, Bankman-Fried‚Äôs testimony will commence after the government conclud‚Ä¶

entry.summary:
JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon has identified nuclear proliferation as ‚Äúthe most serious thing facing mankind.‚Äù According to the United Nations, ‚Äúthe risk of a nuclear weapon being used is currently higher than at any time since the depths of the Cold War.‚Äù Dimon also pointed out that ‚Äúcentral banks 18 months ago were 100% dead wrong.‚Äù
Jamie Dimon Discusses Greatest Threats to Global Economy
The chairman and CEO of JPMorgan Chase, Jamie Dimon, discussed the greatest threats to the global economy and the state of the U.S. economy on Tuesday during a panel discussion at the Future Investment Initiative (FII) summit in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. He underscored the seriousness of the proliferation of nuclear weapons, ranking it above climate change and other commonly cited threats.

entry.summary:
Insolvent FTX Trading Ltd is taking proactive steps towards resurrecting itself, as the exchange is presently in talks with potential bidders with the aim of either selling the crypto company or forging strategic partnerships to possibly stage a comeback into the crypto market.¬†

Bankrupt crypto exchange FTX is making efforts to bounce back from insolvency and possibly restart its operations. According to Bloomberg reports, the exchange has disclosed three potential bidders emerging with their various proposals for the future of FTX.

entry.title: 'Art of the Times': Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon on the State of Generative Art
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder and CEO Erick Calderon sat down with Sander Lutz, lead culture reporter at Decrypt's SCENE, at Art Blocks Marfa Weekend 2023. They discuss the evolution of the company and the generative art world, along with what draws art enthusiasts to be an active part of the community.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: Digital Ownership Explained
entry.summary: One of the most powerful aspects of blockchain technology is its ability to provide us genuine ownership of our digital assets. This is called digital ownership. In this video, we‚Äôll deep dive into digital ownership, why it matters, and how web3 makes owning digital assets like our social networks, music libraries, personal data, and beyond possible. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Writer at Consensys.

entry.title: Martin Shkreli on E/ACC and SBF in Prison
entry.summary: Reza Jafery and Martin Shkreli sit down for a casual conversation about the growing movement that is E/ACC, what songs they could recite at gunpoint, and whether or not SBF will thrive or just survive during his time in prison.

entry.title: What Can AI Do in Gaming?
entry.summary: AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie discuss how artificial intelligence can shape the video game experience.

entry.title: 'There Are No Real Standards': Ready Player Me CEO Timmu T√µke on Building for an Open Gaming Ecosystem
entry.summary: Timmu T√µke, co-founder and CEO of Ready Player Me, joins Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin to discuss the startup's approach to powering avatars that are interoperable across games and metaverse platforms‚Äîand what's needed to convince the industry to adopt standards and open up.

entry.title: Blockchain Is 'Only Way' Forward for Gaming, Says Shrapnel Studio Head
entry.summary: Shrapnel Studio Head Don Norbury tells Kate Irwin the reasons why the upcoming first-person shooter game will offer a wide range of NFTs. He also reveals team-based gameplay plans and shares how game maps have already changed this year.

entry.title: Social Media Sentiment Is Key to Crypto Price Discovery
entry.summary: Sacha Ghebali, Director of Strategy and Business Development at The TIE, says social media sentiment remains a key factor in price movements for major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum. However, he notes that sentiment has turned more negative lately amid regulatory uncertainty. Ghebali believes events like the Ripple lawsuit ruling significantly impacted sentiment and prices. Andr√© Beganski interviewed him at Messari Mainnet.
